metadata.title: CVE-2017-7346 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The vmw_gb_surface_define_ioctl function indrivers/gpu/drm/vmwgfx/vmwgfx_surface.c in the Linux kernel through 4.10.7does not validate certain levels data, which allows local users to cause adenial of service (system hang) via a crafted ioctl call for a/dev/dri/renderD* device.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7346` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-125-generic - 3.13.0-125.174
linux-image-3.13.0-125-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-125.174
